page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: bag.Having said goodbye to my parents I set off on my bike for school.I arrive at school at about 8.55 for five minutes play before the bell rings.After the first{lesson}we go out to play for fifteen minutes during which time I eat my candy sticks.After playtime we have a story and then do a bit of science until{dinner}time.After lunch we do our Domesday project.We have an afternoon break after which we listen to a story such as The Silver Sword.At{hometime}I sometimes go to my friend Becky's house and walk back to my house across the fields with her after she has got changed.We go down to the playing fields until 5.30 when I go home for my tea and watch television until 9.30 when I have to go to{bed.
